title: post api auth register valid user
description: Test user registration with valid username, email, password, and confirmPassword. Verify response 201 with user details and role assignment (first user as admin, others as candidates) and auth_session cookie set.

title: post api auth register invalid input
description: Test user registration with invalid inputs such as username too short or passwords mismatch. Verify response 400 with validation error details.

title: post api auth register duplicate username or email
description: Test user registration with already registered username or email. Verify response 400 with appropriate error message indicating duplicate username or email.

title: post api auth login valid credentials
description: Test user login with valid username and password. Verify response 200 with user details and auth_session cookie set.

title: post api auth login invalid credentials
description: Test user login with invalid username or password. Verify response 401 with error message indicating invalid credentials.

title: post api auth logout valid session
description: Test user logout with valid auth_session cookie. Verify response 200 with success true and auth_session cookie cleared.

title: post api auth logout without session
description: Test user logout without auth_session cookie. Verify response 401 unauthorized error.

title: get api auth session with valid session
description: Test retrieving current user session with valid auth_session cookie. Verify response 200 with user and session details.

title: get api auth session without session
description: Test retrieving current user session without auth_session cookie. Verify response 401 unauthorized error.

title: post api rooms create room as admin
description: Test creating a new game room with valid name and participantLimit as admin user. Verify response 201 with success true and room details.
